title: "Sessions Focus on Unattended Ops, Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Unattended operation greatly increases the ability to produce more parts, reducing backlogs even when the lights are out. The issue with unattended operation is that it is impossible to monitor unless you are using an Automated Production Intelligence solution that requires no operator input."
